text: New experience - I talked about the Ariadne/Cluster 5 space disaster (which Iâ€™d learned from @KevlinHenney) as an abstract example of incomplete integration testing, and someone came up after talk to tell me she was involved with the Cluster project. That makes it less abstract!

author.name: Holly Cummins (holly_cummins@hachyderm.io)
author.description: @RedHat - Senior Principal Software Engineer, working on @QuarkusIO. Ex-IBM. Java Champion, developer, author, #cloud surfer and maker. My views are my own.
